title: Brand R Sometime Wont Bounce
body: So i was playing ranked yesterday with some friends and he was playing brand and he noticed twice that his R didn't bounce after the initial hit to the opposite mid laner. There were minions around and it just disappeared. Later another player was also playing brand mid when they encountered the same bug on a roam bot lane which ended but disappointment when their ult didn't bounce resulting in no kills. I was wondering if anybody else had faced this issue?

replies.body: We're aware of this issue and you should see a fix soon! Thanks for the report!
You know, I'm beginning to think with how many reports there are of this, that people just want the satisfaction of getting a Riot to respond to them lol
I think part of it is, people don't read other bug report posts, haha. It's fine, I try to reply to a few a day, so it's showing up on the front page/red tracker. :P

I found same problem here's the link to my post:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/MXrxxlsb-brands-ult-doesnt-bounce-bug-confirmed

I also just saw this bug. All game long, ult would not work on the enemy mid laner, just not bouncing off minions, monsters, or players. Others on my team noticed it and were confused as well. It was bouncing correctly on other people, just not the mid laner.

Same thing happened to me yesterday on two occasions, first game I was mid against yasuo, I ulted him in a minion wave and I noticed my ult disappeared, I didn't think much as he might've just wind walled it, but there was no windwall. The second game it happened was on Twisted Treeline, my second Brand game of the day, again I ulted Lee Sin when he had minions nearby, and still no bounce. This is quite a big bug considering it happened in both of my Brand games yesterday. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
